title: Sam Altman’s Exit Exposes Tensions in OpenAI’s Boardroom and a Mission That Fell Short
description: In a seismic shakeup within the realm of artificial intelligence, Sam Altman, the co-founder and erstwhile CEO of OpenAI, found himself ousted on November 17, just days after being hailed as a visionary at the company’s inaugural developer conference. The abrupt turn of events, framed as a “breakdown in communication” by the board, laid bare ... Read more
